Name: I'll Take Manhattan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Cherry is more than a garnish in this twist on the classic Sweet Manhattan .
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at The Stanton Social in New York City, USA. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of I'll Take Manhattan contains 248 calories
